The original: full-length video showing Erica Walker standing on an American flag for more than a minute as National Guard troops turned away.
Confirmation from Erica Walker herself t: s death, and her denial of deliberately trying to provoke or upset the National Guard troops.
Testimony from Vaun Mayes: who shot the original video, stating that the voice in the video pointing out the National Guard members turning around was his own, and his belief that they had done so collectively and consciously in response to Walker's protest.
